> <OLD - Nightlight:>
>
> Nightlight ran in every room of the base, looking for Elita or Rodimus.
> While she was doing that she started to track her daughter, but she couldnt
> pick up her signature, then she tried to Track Rodimu's signature.

As NIGHTLIGHT moved through the Ark she walked up upon LEO PRIME
walking with LORD ELDER, LEGACY and WING CALIBER, the four of them
talking amongst themselves in quiet yet stern tones. They were
standing on the bridge of the ship.

LEO looked up as NIGHTLIGHT entered, "Is something wrong?" The look on
his face was concerned and yet he also looked like a mech who was
under a lot of pressure.

(TAG)

Preston
